text: Uyarntha Manithan () is an upcoming Indian film directed by Tamilvannan. This film marks the reunion of Amitabh Bachchan and Ramya Krishnan after 21 years of their film Bade Miyan Chote Miyan that released in the year 1998 marking the last film of Ramya Krishnan in Bollywood. Principal filming started in March 2019. This film marks Bachchan's debut in Tamil cinema. ==Cast== *Amitabh Bachchan *S. J. Surya *Ramya Krishnan == References == Category:Tamil-language films Category:Upcoming films Category:Indian multilingual films Category:Upcoming Tamil-language films Category:Indian films
title: Uyarntha Manithan (upcoming film)
